segments.speaker: Casey
segments.text: So this place came highly recommended. Have you been here before?

segments.speaker: Riley
segments.text: No, first time! It's really nice though. Um, I hope I'm not underdressed.

segments.speaker: Casey
segments.text: You look great, don't worry. So, you mentioned you work in design?

segments.speaker: Riley
segments.text: Yeah! I'm a UX designer. It's um, it's really fun actually. I get to solve puzzles all day basically. Sorry, I'm rambling.

segments.speaker: Casey
segments.text: No, I love it! Tell me more. What kind of puzzles?

segments.speaker: Riley
segments.text: Well like... okay so imagine someone's trying to buy something online and they can't find the checkout button. My job is to figure out why and fix it. Make it intuitive.

segments.speaker: Casey
segments.text: That's actually really cool. I bet you notice bad design everywhere now.

segments.speaker: Riley
segments.text: Oh my god, yes. It's a curse. I can't use an app without mentally redesigning it. Anyway, what about you? What's your day-to-day like?
